definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Jos 11:17, Jos 12:7, Jos 13:5 (D), where Baal was worshipped as Gad, god of fortune, a city in the [[בִּקְעָה]] of Lebanon, under Mt. Hermon; either mod. Bâniâs, Gk. Paneas, NT Caesarea Philippi, where a grotto of Pan took the place of the ancient worship of Gad, Rob:BR iii. 410 Tristr:Tpg 271; or Ḥâsbêyâ Bd:Pal 297 Di; possibly = [[בעל חרמון]] cf. Thes Rob:BR iii. 409.
